content:
Eesho daashansheemone-veeshikkondaan;
Meen pol narare vanrakshitharodo-ppam chertthu;
Romaamel vala veeshi thaan-bandhithayaakki
Pennaadu samam sabhayil chertthaan pen-simhatthe
/tmoortthikalle-vittavallarchippoo
/trakshakane!-ninnude sleebaaye
Nyangallumathine kooppunnu naathhaa! - krpa cheyka.

Maar paulose punyanidhe!-parishuddhaa! Nin
Naathhanodarththhikkuka ninnormmadine nyangallkkaayu
Vegatthil thvalpraarththhanakall-shraddhicheeshan
Sabhayeprathi yaachikkunnavayellaam-nalkunnu
/tshaanti sabha-ykkum makkallkkellaam
/tmochanavum-naathhan nalkatte
Paaridamengum nin smrthiyavaraagho-shicheedum.
